description: Timepoint Template Catalog - Verified templates only

comprehensive.description: Full mechanism exercise with rich scenarios

mechanisms.M1: Heterogeneous Fidelity - Different resolution levels in same scene
mechanisms.M2: Progressive Training - Entity quality improves over queries
mechanisms.M3: Exposure Events - Knowledge flows from source to target
mechanisms.M4: Physics Validation - Constraints block invalid states
mechanisms.M5: Lazy Resolution - Query elevates resolution on demand
mechanisms.M7: Causal Chains - Events in proper temporal order
mechanisms.M8: Embodied States - Physical state affects cognition
mechanisms.M12: Counterfactual Branching - Timeline splits at decision points
mechanisms.M13: Relationship Evolution - Trust/tension changes over time
mechanisms.M15: Entity Prospection - Entity models future states
mechanisms.M16: Animistic Entities - Non-human entities have agency
